overview: "The Real Bricklin Story" about the revolutionary gull winged safety sports car built in Canadaâ€™s maritime province of New Brunswick. More than a car movie, SV-1:The Bricklin Inquiry is a compelling story full of valuable lessons for us all. Despite political posturing and other sordid challenges a group of talented automotive pros almost succeeded in the seventies. Forty years later the car has found its real wings with a true place in automotive history, not just Canadian automotive history. Find out if founder Malcolm Bricklin was a visionary or con?
title: SV1: The Bricklin Inquiry
